system.description:
At the start of the combat the Barbarian recieves enugh Rage to instantly trigger their frenzy, once they have done this they canâ€™t use this ability again until the next Long Rest . Additionally while in a frenzy the Barbarian gains the following benefits

  • The Barbarian recieves 3 extra Rage at the start of their turn instead of 1.

  • The HP they regain because of their Rage is doubled.

  • The Barbarian is immune to the [STUNNED II] and [STUNNED III] status effects.

  • Dropping to Deaths Door during a frenzy causes no Exhaustion (however recieving damage during Deaths Door still does)
